browserActionLabelDefault.description: Label of the button before the extension has loaded completely.

browserActionLabelOff.description: Label of the button when the extension is disabled.
browserActionLabelOff.message: Remove Redirect is disabled, click to enable

browserActionLabelOn.description: Label of the button when the extension is enabled.
browserActionLabelOn.message: Remove Redirect is enabled, click to disable

extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension in the add-on manager.
extensionDescription.message: Remove intermediary pages that some pages use before redirecting to a final page.

extensionName.description: Name of the extension in the add-on manager.

optionsBlacklistContent.description: Label of the text area to edit the blacklist.

optionsModeBlacklist.description: The choice that sets the extension into blacklist mode.
optionsModeBlacklist.message: Remove all redirects except for URLs matching any of the lines in the blacklist.

optionsModeOff.description: The choice that disables the extension.

optionsModeWhitelist.description: The choice that sets the extension into whitelist mode.
optionsModeWhitelist.message: Remove redirects only for URLs matching any of the lines in the whitelist.

optionsSectionMode.description: Title of the options section allowing to toggle between blacklist and whitelist or disable the extension.

optionsRemoveRedirectsToSameDomain.description: Label of the checkbox that toggles Removeping to the same public domain.
optionsRemoveRedirectsToSameDomain.message: Remove redirects for URLs with the same public domain

optionsWhitelistContent.description: Label of the text area to edit the whitelist.
